title: (x) Shakira logo - Alien Porn Font {Yves}
content:
Hey guys! I’m new here but i’ve been lurking around for a while.

I was having trouble locating this font. At first I thought it was something made just for her but on her fanclub this font was used alot, so since then i’ve been looking for it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219010110im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/example_5207.jpg)

Thanks!

 [‹ (x) serif face used on Giampietro+Smith website/ portfolio - fedra Serif {Akira}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219010110/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38169 "Go to previous forum topic") [New typefaces in Wallpaper magazine ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219010110/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38143 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Faiyaz

comments.content: Woo-hah! It’s the return of the [alien porn font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219010110/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10084)!?! Classic! :^D
LMAO! that thread is funny.. well so theres no such font eh?
Affraid not, Faiyaz. This appears to be custom drawn for Shakira. Looking at the quality of the design, she probably even did it herself. ;^)
